siteMetadata.title: Piotr Mionskowski
siteMetadata.subtitle: Piotr Mionskowski's thoughts on software, technology, architecture, design patterns and programming in general.

node.excerpt: Recently I was fixing a bug in an application written in angularjs which turned out to be pretty interesting for me. At first I couldn’t reproduce the error and just when I got frustrated it happened exactly as stated in the issue tracker. As it turned out the problem was caused by fast clicking on the same button…

As I mentioned in my previous post I’ll describe my thoughts and findings about 3 popular JavaScript libraries that help building large web application. I’ll start with AngularJs which is the first one I’ve used in a real product. Model View Whatever Angular team didn’t try hard to map their concepts to classical MVC…
